title: Neutraface serif compliment
content:
Hello all,

I am doing an information design project on tea, and I am considering using Neutra because of its clean lines and nods to Eastern styles. I was wondering if anyone had paired it up in the past with a serif, and if so what they found worked for them and what didn't. Thanks for the help

d
author: becker513

comments.content: Can you explain what you mean by "Eastern styles"?
